name: Prism
short_description:
Prism is a semantic web library collection and publication framework used to simplify secure publication of RDF content. The software includes a number of scalable triple store implementations built on top of NoSQL products (Hbase, Accumulo, Solr, Cassandra, etc.). It also includes support for implementing statement-level security over arbitrary triple store implementations. Linked data and SPARQL endpoint support is also included in a Java-based web application.

The  package can be used in different ways. You can use the individual libraries in your own solution or you can use the out-of-the-box web application to speed implementation. The software is meant to function as both a set of building blocks and as a cohesive unit. The choice of how to leverage the building blocks is left to the application developer.
summary: Semantic web library collection and publication framework.
